title: Full Show (Chiefs defeat Chargers, Suns minority owner wants Sarver to resign, Will Bucs, Brady beat Saints?)
description:
00:00 Chiefs take down Chargers 27-24 on TNF.
21:09 Suns minority owner calls for Sarver to resign after NBA report of misconduct
50:09 Will the Tom Brady led Bucs finally get a win over the Saints in Week 2?
1:00:28 Kyrie Irving reposts a 20-year old conspiracy theory about “New World Order”
1:12:54 Joe Burrow has been criticized for speaking out on social issues this summer
1:25:22 Baker and the Panthers look to bounce back against the Giants. Who wins?
1:34:00 Did Mahomes give an MVP performance or was he just lucky?
1:47:19 Did Herbert outperform Mahomes in a loss to the Chiefs?
1:52:16 A Michael Jordan game-worn 1998 NBA Finals jersey just sold for a record $10.1 million. Would a LeBron jersey go for more?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
